newsitem.title: USA: Buckle May same store sales up 13.6 pct.
newsitem.headline: Buckle May same store sales up 13.6 pct.

text.p: Buckle Inc, a retailer of casual apparel for young men and women, said Thursday that comparable store sales for the four-week period ended May 31, 1997 rose 13.6 percent from the same period last year.
Total sales increased 24.5 percent to $15.3 million from $12.3 million in the corresponding four- week period of fiscal 1996.

Net sales year-to-date, for the seventeen weeks ended May 31, 1997 increased 21.9 percent to $63.6 million from $52.2 million for the corresponding seventeen weeks in the prior year. Comparable store sales year-to-date were up 11.5 percent from sales in the same seventeen-week period of the previous year.
Buckle operates 188 retail apparel stores in 24 states, compared with 171 stores in 22 states at this same time a year ago.
